attributes.action: Help try to keep the Athenaeum Theatre Plymouth open for Public Performances through this Petition
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Please sign this petition to try to help keep the Athenaeum Theatre Plymouth open as a Theatre for public performances.

government_responses.details:
You signed a petition asking the Prime Minister to "Help try to keep the Athenaeum Theatre Plymouth open for Public Performances through this Petition."

The Prime Minister's Office has responded to that petition and you can view it here: 

http://www.number10.gov.uk/Page22661


Prime Minister's Office
